headline: Will Long Island City Woes and Class Actions Change Alexandria Real Estate Equities' (ARE) Narrative?
summary: In recent months, Alexandria Real Estate Equities has faced weaker quarterly results, a real estate impairment tied to its Long Island City property, a dividend cut, and a negative outlook revision from S&P amid sector headwinds and slower leasing. These setbacks have also prompted multiple securities class action filings and fiduciary-duty investigations, centering on alleged misstatements about the Long Island City asset’s value and leasing prospects within Alexandria’s Megacampus...

headline: Is Alexandria Real Estate Equities a 2025 Opportunity After a 50% Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether Alexandria Real Estate Equities is a beaten down opportunity or a value trap, you are not alone. This is exactly the kind of setup where valuation work really matters. The stock now trades around $48.76, up 2.5% over the last week but still down 4.8% over 30 days and roughly 50% year to date, which indicates that sentiment has been on a long slide even as short term buyers test the waters. Recent coverage has focused on how higher interest rates and shifting...
